content: corner-to-corner blankie from string theory yarn shop materials 1 skein cascade swaddle us 11 8mm needles gauge 12 stitches and 24 row = 4 10cm finished size carrier 17 43cm abbreviations instructions co - cast on sts - stitches co 2 sts k - knit row 1 kfb twice kfb - knit front and back row 2 k across yo - yarn over row 3 kfb k2 kfb k2tog - knit two together row 4 k3 yo k3 bobble - bind off row 5 k3 yo k to end repeat row 5 until half of your yarn has been used row 6 k2 k2tog yo k2tog k to end corner-to-corner blankie is not only perfect for beginners but repeat row 6 until 7 sts remain is perfect for anyone looking to whip up a gift fast row 7 k2tog k across row 8 k2tog k2 k2tog knit with bulky yarn and large row 9 k across needles you can make a row 10 k2tog twice snuggly blanket just in time for bobble all sts a little one s arrival or as a cozy way to stay warm when the cold weather sneaks up on you want a bigger blankie just use more skeins grab 2 for a crib size or 4 for a lap blankie corner-to-corner blankie c string theory yarn shop 2016
